text: How to create folders using file names and then move files into folders?
I have hundreds of text files in a folder named using this kind of naming convention:

code:
Bandname1 - song1.txt
Bandname1 - song2.txt
Bandname2 - song1.txt
Bandname2 - song2.txt
Bandname2 - song3.txt
Bandname3 - song1.txt
..etc.

text: I would like to create folders for different bands and move according text files into these folders.
How could I achieve this using bash, perl or python script?
